Package org.elasticsearch.search.suggest.completion

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CompletionTokenStream.ByteTermAttribute  
    CompletionTokenStream.ToFiniteStrings  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalyzingCompletionLookupProvider  
    Completion090PostingsFormat
    This PostingsFormat is basically a T-Sink for a default postings format that is used to store postings on disk fitting the lucene APIs and builds a suggest FST as an auxiliary data structure next to the actual postings format.
    Completion090PostingsFormat.CompletionLookupProvider  
    Completion090PostingsFormat.CompletionTerms  
    Completion090PostingsFormat.LookupFactory  
    CompletionPostingsFormatProvider  
    CompletionStats  
    CompletionSuggester  
    CompletionSuggester.ScoreComparator  
    CompletionSuggestion  
    CompletionSuggestion.Entry  
    CompletionSuggestion.Entry.Option  
    CompletionSuggestionBuilder
    Defines a suggest command based on a prefix, typically to provide "auto-complete" functionality for users as they type search terms.
    CompletionSuggestionContext  
    CompletionSuggestionFuzzyBuilder
    A form of CompletionSuggestionBuilder that supports fuzzy queries allowing matches on typos.
    CompletionSuggestParser  
    CompletionTokenStream  
    CompletionTokenStream.ByteTermAttributeImpl
